job.title: Data Scientist Jr - RappiPay
job.description: YOUR NEXT STEP IS AT RAPPIltbrgtltbrgtRappi is one of the first Latin American unicorns and a startup that continues to focus on growing and making life easier for our users As a company we seek to continue improving the services we already offer add more to our offer and continue expanding throughout the Latin American continentltbrgtltbrgtThe TeamltbrgtltbrgtOur expectations are pretty high for Data Scientist positions The Data Science team plays a leading role in solving our most challenging problems and guiding the decisions that we take around product growth and operations Information is only valuable when transformed into actionable insights and it is through experimentation hightempo testing rigorous measurement and correct communication that our teams achieve our audacious goal to establish Rappi as the superapp in LatAmltbrgtltbrgtYour Impact You willltbrgtltbrgtBuild implement and maintain machine learning systems in technology products Lead engineering best practices for scaling ML and designingbuilding software that is reliable scalable and secureltbrgtltbrgtBe responsible for the implementation testing and release of a range of models both for existing and tobeinvented use casesltbrgtltbrgtWork closely with Machine Learning scientists to design code train test deploy iterate and own stateoftheart systems for executing ML
